verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Israel, return unto \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H2719"\w* God; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* hast \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* \w by|strong="H5307"\w* thine iniquity.

\w Take|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* words, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*: \w say|strong="H7725"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H7725"\w*, \w Take|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* accept \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* good: \w so|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w render|strong="H7725"\w* \add as\add* bullocks \add the offering of\add* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* lips.

Assyria \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* save \w us|strong="H7725"\w*; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H7725"\w* ride \w upon|strong="H5375"\w* horses; \w neither|strong="H5973"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H7725"\w* anymore \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* hands, \add Ye are\add* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* gods; \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* fatherless findeth \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* heal \w their|strong="H5921"\w* backsliding, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w love|strong="H7355"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* freely; \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w mine|strong="H3027"\w* anger \w is|strong="H3027"\w* turned \w away|strong="H5750"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dew \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* Israel; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H4878"\w* blossom \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* lily, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* cast forth \w his|strong="H7725"\w* roots \w as|strong="H3588"\w* Lebanon.

\w His|strong="H5221"\w* branches \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* spread, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* beauty \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* olive tree, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H5221"\w* smell \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.

They \w that|strong="H1961"\w* dwell \w under|strong="H3844"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* shadow \w shall|strong="H2132"\w* return; they \w shall|strong="H2132"\w* revive \add as\add* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* grain, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* blossom \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* vine: \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w scent|strong="H7381"\w* thereof \w shall|strong="H2132"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* wine \w of|strong="H7381"\w* \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*.

Ephraim \add shall say\add*, What \w have|strong="H1612"\w* \w I|strong="H6738"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w do|strong="H1612"\w* anymore \w with|strong="H3427"\w* idols? \w I|strong="H6738"\w* \w have|strong="H1612"\w* \w answered|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H3844"\w* regard \w him|strong="H7725"\w*: \w I|strong="H6738"\w* am \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* green fir \w tree|strong="H1612"\w*; \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w is|strong="H1715"\w* \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* fruit found.

\w Who|strong="H4672"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* wise, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w may|strong="H4480"\w* understand these things? prudent, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w may|strong="H4480"\w* know \w them|strong="H4672"\w*? \w for|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* ways \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* right, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* just \w shall|strong="H4100"\w* walk \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w them|strong="H4672"\w*; \w but|strong="H6030"\w* transgressors \w shall|strong="H4100"\w* \w fall|strong="H4672"\w* therein.
